speaker: Mia
text: I've been trying to build a better portfolio website, but it's taking forever.
ipa: aɪv bɪn ˈtraɪɪŋ tə bɪld ə ˈbɛtɚ pɔɹtˈfoʊlioʊ ˈwɛbˌsaɪt | bət ɪts ˈteɪkɪŋ fɚˈɛvɚ
stress: I've been TRYING to BUILD a BETTER PORTFOLIO WEBSITE | but it's TAKING FOREVER
linking:
"trying to" → /ˈtraɪɪŋ tə/ (ng + t linking)
"build a" → /bɪld ə/ (d + a linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: Maybe you should consider hiring a designer to help with the layout.
ipa: ˈmeɪbi jʊ ʃəd kənˈsɪdɚ ˈhaɪɚɪŋ ə dɪˈzaɪnɚ tə hɛlp wɪð ðə ˈleɪˌaʊt
stress: Maybe YOU should CONSIDER HIRING a DESIGNER to HELP with the LAYOUT
linking:
"consider hiring" → /kənˈsɪdɚ ˈhaɪɚɪŋ/ (r + h linking)
"help with" → /hɛlp wɪð/ (p + w linking)

speaker: Mia
text: I hate depending on other people, but you might be right. I aim to finish the site by next month.
ipa: aɪ heɪt dɪˈpɛndɪŋ ɑn ˈʌðɚ ˈpipəl | bət jʊ maɪt bi raɪt | aɪ eɪm tə ˈfɪnɪʃ ðə saɪt baɪ nɛkst mʌnθ
stress: I HATE DEPENDING on OTHER PEOPLE | but YOU might be RIGHT | I AIM to FINISH the SITE by NEXT MONTH
linking:
"depending on" → /dɪˈpɛndɪŋ ɑn/ (ng + o linking)
"aim to" → /eɪm tə/ (m + t linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: That’s a good goal. Just remember to update your GitHub links and case studies too.
ipa: ðæts ə ɡʊd ɡoʊl | ʤəst ɹɪˈmɛmbɚ tə ˈʌpˌdeɪt jɚ ˈɡɪtˌhʌb lɪŋks ənd keɪs ˈstʌdiz tu
stress: That's a GOOD GOAL | Just REMEMBER to UPDATE your GITHUB LINKS and CASE STUDIES too
linking:
"remember to" → /ɹɪˈmɛmbɚ tə/ (r + t linking)
"update your" → /ˈʌpˌdeɪt jɚ/ (t + y linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Thanks for the reminder! Sometimes I forget to double-check the smaller details.
ipa: θæŋks fɚ ðə ɹɪˈmaɪndɚ | ˈsəmˌtaɪmz aɪ fɚˈɡɛt tə ˈdʌbəl ʧɛk ðə ˈsmɔlɚ ˈdiˌteɪlz
stress: Thanks for the REMINDER | SOMETIMES I FORGET to DOUBLE-CHECK the SMALLER DETAILS
linking:
"forget to" → /fɚˈɡɛt tə/ (t + t linking)
"double-check the" → /ˈdʌbəl ʧɛk ðə/ (k + th linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: It's normal. When you’re busy, you might go on overlooking simple things. You just have to keep improving little by little.
ipa: ɪts ˈnɔɹməl | wɛn jʊɹ ˈbɪzi | jʊ maɪt ɡoʊ ɑn ˌoʊvɚˈlʊkɪŋ ˈsɪmpəl θɪŋz | jʊ ʤəst hæv tə kip ɪmˈpɹuvɪŋ ˈlɪɾl baɪ ˈlɪɾl
stress: It's NORMAL | When YOU’RE BUSY | you MIGHT go on OVERLOOKING SIMPLE THINGS | You just have to KEEP IMPROVING LITTLE by LITTLE
linking:
"go on" → /ɡoʊ ɑn/ (o + o linking)
"keep improving" → /kip ɪmˈpɹuvɪŋ/ (p + i linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Lately, I've felt like giving up a few times, though.
ipa: ˈleɪtli aɪv fɛlt laɪk ˈɡɪvɪŋ ʌp ə fju taɪmz ðoʊ
stress: LATELY, I've FELT like GIVING UP a FEW TIMES, though

speaker: Daniel
text: Everyone goes through that. You must refuse to quit if you really want to succeed.
ipa: ˈɛvɚˌwʌn ɡoʊz θɹu ðæt | jʊ məst ɹɪˈfjuz tə kwɪt ɪf jʊ ˈɹɪli wɑnt tə səkˈsid
stress: EVERYONE GOES THROUGH THAT | You MUST REFUSE to QUIT if you REALLY WANT to SUCCEED
linking:
"refuse to" → /ɹɪˈfjuz tə/ (z + t linking)
"want to" → /wɑnt tə/ (t + t linking)

speaker: Mia
text: You’re right. I hope to launch my site before my next client meeting.
ipa: jʊɹ raɪt | aɪ hoʊp tə lɔntʃ maɪ saɪt bɪˈfɔɹ maɪ nɛkst ˈklaɪənt ˈmitɪŋ
stress: You're RIGHT | I HOPE to LAUNCH my SITE before my NEXT CLIENT MEETING
linking:
"hope to" → /hoʊp tə/ (p + t linking)
"launch my" → /lɔntʃ maɪ/ (ch + m linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: Good plan. By the way, you should ask your friends to review your site before making it public.
ipa: ɡʊd plæn | baɪ ðə weɪ | jʊ ʃəd æsk jɚ frɛndz tə ɹɪˈvju jɚ saɪt bɪˈfɔɹ ˈmeɪkɪŋ ɪt ˈpʌblɪk
stress: GOOD PLAN | By the WAY | You SHOULD ASK your FRIENDS to REVIEW your SITE before MAKING it PUBLIC
linking:
"ask your" → /æsk jɚ/ (k + y linking)
"review your" → /ɹɪˈvju jɚ/ (w + y linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Will do! And if they suggest changing anything, I’ll seriously think about it.
ipa: wɪl du | ənd ɪf ðeɪ səˈʤɛst ˈʧeɪnʤɪŋ ˈɛniˌθɪŋ | aɪl ˈsɪɹiəsli θɪŋk əˈbaʊt ɪt
stress: WILL DO | And if THEY SUGGEST CHANGING ANYTHING | I'll SERIOUSLY THINK ABOUT IT
linking:
"suggest changing" → /səˈʤɛst ˈʧeɪnʤɪŋ/ (t + ch linking)
"think about" → /θɪŋk əˈbaʊt/ (k + a linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: Perfect. You’re managing to grow your freelance career faster than you realize.
ipa: ˈpɝfɪkt | jʊɹ ˈmænɪʤɪŋ tə ɡɹoʊ jʊɹ ˈfriˌlæns kəˈɹɪɚ ˈfæstɚ ðæn jʊ ˈɹiəˌlaɪz
stress: PERFECT | You’re MANAGING to GROW your FREELANCE CAREER FASTER than you REALIZE
linking:
"managing to grow" → /ˈmænɪʤɪŋ tə ɡɹoʊ/ (ng + t linking, to reduced)
"faster than" → /ˈfæstɚ ðæn/ (r + th linking)
